out_desc_attend: Table 8 – days attending school (converted 1.919 increase of ‘# days child attended ECD in past 7 days’ to 27.414% as 1.919 extra days in a week of 7 days  1.919*100/7=27.414%) & used excel formula of 1 SD=33.5% etc. I get smd= 0.818208955 (seems rather large!!! Not sure about SE, therefore left blank for someone to check (if I used the same formula for SE given in parenthesis in Table 8 I get SE=0.182089552) but not sure about that….)
out_desc_other_outcome: # days ECD center open in past 7 days  ( “open” implied that the caregiver/teacher was present) )  Table 8 -converted 2.431 increase of ‘#days ECD center open in past 7 days’ to 34.72% as 2.431 extra days in a week of 7 days  2.431*100/7=34.72%) & used excel formula of 1 SD=33.5% etc. I get smd= 1.036656716  (seems huge?!!! Not sure about SE either, see above, assumption in #days child attended centre)
